aspect: Chelsea bids for FC Tokyo's 22-year-old forward Yoshinori Muto, who will join Vitesse Arnhem on loan if the transfer completes. Muto, who graduated from Keio University with an economics degree, would be the first Japanese player representing Chelsea.
